title: Get your SMART NFT AVATAR for life in the Metaverse
description: AMBER is a Metaverse and NFT game with a variety of battle modes in which NFTs are your digital property: characters, weapons, vehicles, real estate, land. The first 8888 unique 3D NFT avatars are your entry into a new virtual game world, your blockchain 'soul'
sorryDesc: We're working on it and we'll get it fixed as soon as we can
getFullownership: Get full ownership of your character
receivingRareNFT: Receiving rare NFTs will generate a steam of tokens:
obtainStatus: Obtain First Citizen of AMBER status
becomeMember: Become Member of the NFT DAO
recentlyMintedDesc: We focus on industry leading plateforms so that  you can be prepared for your next job. Then we teach all we can about them
getNFTUnique: Get your NFT avatar with a unique look and rarity
getNFTDesc: With a certain probability you can get rare NFT with staking and streaming tokens, which will bring you an income of up to 300N tokens from NFT!
participateGame: Enter the game with your NFT avatar and participate in battles and win.
gameDesc: In the game such combat modes as Deathmatch, Team Deatchmatch, Capture Flag are available. Coming Soon - battle royale
tradeDesc: Trade or Sell NFTs that you bought or received while playing the AMBER Metaverse.
tradeSmallDesc: ABMER is using the improved ERC-721 NFT standart to expand your NFT features and these NFTs can be sold on the Marketplaces
rule3: Receiving rare NFTs will generate a stream of tokens:
instruct2: Have ownership of your character. Be able to collect, sell and donate. play the AMBER game.
instruct3: Become an AMBER first settler and become an AMBER NFT DAO (1NFT = 1 vote).
instruct4: By obtaining rare NFTs you will receive a prize in the form of NEAR streams through the Roketo service (roke.to): 300N - 1 piece (valid for 1 year), 30N - 8 pieces (valid for 6 months), 5N - 80 pieces (valid for 1 month) to the NFT owner's wallet (distribution after sale).
instruct5: Each NFT will bring you 2x silver in the game (soon).
instruct6: You can use AR technology and showcase your property anywhere and anytime.
instruct7: With our NFT you can play in the real world, win dance Challenges in TikTok.
instruct8: Get access to a private game club on Discord.
instruct11: Use in games outside of AMBER.
mintDescription: We focus on industry leading platforms so that you can be prepared for your next job. Then we teach all we can about them.

allSold.body: The NFTs have all been created
